projects.title: Modern Office Building
projects.description: A sleek and modern office building with a minimalist design, featuring large glass windows and sustainable building materials.

projects.title: Urban Park
projects.description: An innovative urban park featuring green spaces, walking paths, and water features designed for relaxation and recreation in the city.

projects.title: Luxury Residential Complex
projects.description: A high-end residential complex with panoramic views, spacious apartments, and modern amenities for luxury living.

projects.title: Museum of Contemporary Art
projects.description: A contemporary museum with dynamic architectural features, housing collections of modern art and offering spaces for exhibitions and events.

projects.title: Public Library
projects.description: A community-focused library with state-of-the-art facilities, quiet reading areas, and interactive learning spaces.
